data.subject: Creatives
data.content: I  literally couldn’t do my job or even manage all the business of being a fully functioning parent and spouse without Todoist.
data.name: Khoi Vinh
data.title: Principal Designer at Adobe

data.subject: Developers
data.content: As a software engineer, it’s useful to break down big projects into smaller tasks, and Todoist is perfect for that purpose.
data.name: Tigran Hakobyan
data.title: Senior Product Engineer at Buffer

data.subject: Students
data.content: I kept track of all my school tasks in Todoist and, in 2016, I became the first one in my family to obtain a bachelor’s degree.
data.name: Samantha Houston
data.title: Software Engineer

data.subject: Small bussiness
data.content: Todoist has revolutionized the way we run our small business by helping us simplify projects and coordinate tons of details.
data.name: Trevour Stephens
data.title: General Manager at Topline Builders

data.subject: Entrepreneurs
data.content: Todoist gave us the focus to scale our company from 2 to 75 employees, $12M in VC financing, and 350+ happy enterprise customers.
data.name: Andrew Montalenti
data.title: CTO at Parse.ly

data.subject: Freelancers
data.content: Todoist helps me organize all my writing projects. And that makes it an indispensable tool both in business and in life.
data.name: Jennifer Mattern
data.title: Freelance Writer
